relevance_explanation: The routine is mostly relevant, but step 5 (Check Passport Information) in the full routine checks if the passport information is stored in the system; this is used for all users. Although the passport number exists for this user, this step could check for other missing passport info, so it should not have been skipped.
completeness_explanation: The routine is almost complete, but skips step 5 (Check Passport Information) which is needed for all users, regardless of their frequent flyer status. Also skipped is step 6 (Check Visa Information), though arguably that would be skipped due to Frequent Flyer Status.
